mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUM, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NICK, USER_BIRTH,USER_PH,USER_NAME, USER_JOIN_DATE FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum}
SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_NICK = #{userNick}) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, boardList.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NUM, tu.USER_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_UPLOAD_DATE, BOARD_EDIT_DATE, tu.USER_NICK FROM TBL_BOARD tb INNER JOIN TBL_USER tu ON tb.USER_NUM = tu.USER_NUM WHERE tb.USER_NUM = #{userNum} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC ) boardList
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, studyList.* FROM ( SELECT ts.STUDY_NUM, tu.USER_NUM, ts.STUDY_TITLE, ts.STUDY_DESCRIPT, ts.STUDY_LOCATION, ts.STUDY_START_DAY, ts.STUDY_END_DAY, ts.STUDY_START_TIME, ts.STUDY_END_TIME, ts.STUDY_LIMIT, ts.STUDY_DEADLINE, ts.STUDY_SHOWPH, ts.STUDY_CATEGORY, ts.STUDY_UPLOAD_DATE, ts.STUDY_EDIT_DATE, tu.USER_ID, tu.USER_NICK, tu.USER_PH, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STUDY_APPLY tsa WHERE tsa.STUDY_NUM = ts.STUDY_NUM) AS participants FROM TBL_STUDY ts INNER JOIN TBL_USER tu ON ts.USER_NUM = tu.USER_NUM WHERE ts.user_num = tu.user_num ORDER BY STUDY_NUM DESC ) studyList WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}
SELECT COUNT(STUDY_NUM) FROM TBL_STUDY where USER_NUM = #{userNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ta.STUDY_APPLY_NUM, ta.STUDY_NUM, ta.USER_NUM, ta.study_apply_date, -- TBL_STUDY_APPLY 열들 st.STUDY_TITLE, st.STUDY_DESCRIPT, st.STUDY_LOCATION, st.STUDY_START_DAY, st.STUDY_END_DAY, -- TBL_STUDY 열들 u.USER_ID, u.USER_NICK, u.USER_PH, -- TBL_USER 열들 ROWNUM AS rnum FROM TBL_STUDY_APPLY ta JOIN TBL_STUDY st ON ta.STUDY_NUM = st.STUDY_NUM JOIN TBL_USER u ON ta.USER_NUM = u.USER_NUM WHERE ta.USER_NUM = #{userNum} ORDER BY ta.STUDY_NUM DESC ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow} AND rnum <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(STUDY_APPLY_NUM) FROM TBL_STUDY_APPLY where USER_NUM = #{userNum}
SELECT * FROM TBL_LIKE tl JOIN TBL_STUDY ts ON ts.STUDY_NUM = tl.STUDY_NUM WHERE tl.USER_NUM = #{studyNum}

SELECT tsa.study_apply_num, tsa.study_num, tsa.user_num, tu.user_nick, tsa.user_determination, tsa.study_apply_status, tsa.study_apply_date FROM tbl_study_apply tsa JOIN tbl_user tu ON tsa.user_num = tu.user_num WHERE tsa.study_num = #{studyNum} AND tsa.STUDY_APPLY_STATUS =0
